title: Randomized Quickselect
subtitle: Find k-th smallest/largest element in unsorted array efficiently
code: lows = [el for el in arr if el < pivot]
highs = [el for el in arr if el > pivot]
pivots = [el for el in arr if el == pivot]
additional_information: Quickselect is similar to quicksort but only recursively processes the relevant partition. Efficient for selection problems.
